page.title: 03TRADE
page.content: Most shoppers in West Linton would like to see a large supermarket built that could sell a wide range of food and other goods very cheaply but as this is a very small shopping area this is not possible. We have three food shops,a news-agents,a chemists ,two garden suppliers,a hairdresser who cuts both men and women's hair, a drapers which has recently changed hands and a post office. Older people, mothers of young children and people without cars tend to shop locally. Those with transport go to Edinburgh,Pencuik,and Peebles the nearby city and towns. Many people shop in the large super-markets eg. ASDA,SAVACENTRE and FINEFARE and buy enough food to last a month or more. Many people buy meat, fish etc. to keep in their freezers.
